Package org.apache.openjpa.jdbc.schema

Class ColumnIO

java.lang.Object
org.apache.openjpa.jdbc.schema.ColumnIO
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ColumnIO extends Object implements Serializable
Metadata about column I/O in a specific context. In the context of a foreign key, the standard foreign key columns are indexed first, then the constant columns.
Author:
Abe White
See Also:
